description:
OVERVIEW OF METHODOLOGY:

في هذه الدورة سوف أعطيك المعلومات الضرورية لإتقان أساسيات اللغة باستخدام منهجية التي ثبت أن تكون فعالة. سوف تتعلم المفردات جنبا إلى جنب مع قواعد اللغة من خلال الموضوعات عملي جدا مثل "البيت" أو "الأسرة"، سوف تتعلم المضارع البسيط، في هذه الدورة. توجهي يجعل من السهل للطلاب لفهم الدروس وسوف تصبح واثق بأنه متعلم اللغة الإنجليزية.

In this course I will give you essential information to master the basics of the English language using a methodology which is proven to be effective in almost 1 hour. You will learn vocabulary alongside grammar through very practical themes. The verb tense you will learn in this course is the Simple Present Tense. My approach makes it easy for students to understand the lessons and you will become confident as an English language learner. I have added translations from Arabic to English to make it easier to understand the new vocabulary.

VOCABULARY:

The vocabulary in this course are frequently used words in the daily life of anyone, whether your are a student or employed. Each section has a theme and each them is practical to reflect a person's routine. For example, one usually starts off with greetings and getting to know others and then progress towards talking about the family, work and activities.

GRAMMAR:

This course provides you with an effective way to learn English grammar. Each section introduces one aspect of grammatical rule that goes perfectly with the section theme. As the lessons progress, I build upon the rules you have previously learnt so that you get a chance to practice it.

QUIZ:

I'll tell you the secret to being successful in learning a language: PRACTICE, PRACTICE, PRACTICE. Quizzes are an important part of language learning and through them you will know where your weaknesses are so that you can focus on these areas.

WHY THIS COURSE?

This course is a perfect introduction the the language if you intend to:

- go study English at an institute or a preparatory year

- get a head start before joining a University

- travel to an English speaking country

THE ELC (ENGLISH LANGUAGE COURSE) FRAMEWORK

This course will allow the students to acquire enough language to reach the A1 Level of CEFR and CLB 2, although this course is not completely based on any of them

AIM:

At the end of this course, you will be confident in putting together words to make meaningful sentences so that you may communicate at a basic level with others.
title: English Language Course 1 - Beginner الإنجليزية للمبتدئين
